author: Michael R. Gordon
title: Six Chinese Ships Covertly Aided North Korea. The U.S. Was Watching
text:
Satellite photographs and other intelligence gathered by U.S. officials provide what they say is detailed evidence of at least six Chinese-owned or -operated cargo ships violating United Nations sanctions against North Korea.
The U.S. compiled the information from Asian waters as part of the Trump administrationâ€™s strategy to pressure North Korea into giving up its nuclear weapons and long-range missiles.
